tidbits.title: Adriatic Coastline
tidbits.description: Croatia boasts a stunning Adriatic coastline, adorned with over a thousand islands, charming coastal towns, and crystal-clear waters.

tidbits.title: Historical Treasures
tidbits.description: The country is rich in historical treasures, including well-preserved medieval cities like Dubrovnik, ancient Roman ruins, and diverse cultural heritage.

tidbits.title: Natural Wonders
tidbits.description: Croatia offers diverse landscapes, from the majestic Plitvice Lakes National Park with its cascading waterfalls to the rugged beauty of the Dinaric Alps.
